content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nI used the 'google' command to search for the RICK cryptocurrency whitepaper. My computer returned various results, including a website called Whitepaper.io and a page on the Binance Academy website explaining what a cryptocurrency whitepaper is. The search also returned Ripple XRP whitepapers on whitepaper.io. Additionally, I found a complete database of cryptocurrency whitepapers."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.allcryptowhitepapers.com/", "question": "How can I download the RICK whitepaper?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information on how to download the RICK whitepaper. However, a website is mentioned that offers a database of over 3000 cryptocurrency whitepapers, including popular ones like Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Binance. The website also provides news, a crypto dictionary, and articles on whitepaper research and avoiding cryptocurrency scams. It emphasizes the importance of reading a cryptocurrency's whitepaper before investing and provides resources for learning more about various cryptocurrencies. \n \n Links: ['Skip to content (https://www.allcryptowhitepapers.com/#content)', 'The Whitepaper Database (https://www.allcryptowhitepapers.com/)', ' (https://www.allcryptowhitepapers.com/)', 'Twitter (https://twitter.com/AllCryptoWPs)', 'Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/All-Crypto-Whitepapers-249318835826710/)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}'}]
"""
